She wants to see how strong she is by punching something.
1111.content:
((Authors note: Here in Japan I am used to the metric system BUT I shall put measurment which use the imperial system as well (You know feet and inches) so I hope that's ok. If the story creator wish's I can switch to using only the Imperial.)

Just another day at the bar for Tifa, boring as usual, they didn't get many customers so she polished the glasses and decided to pour herself a drink. As she did she turned her back to put the bottle of whiskey she had poured from back on the selves behind her. so a young woman came in. She was silent like a ninja her footsteps seeming not to register with the wooden floor. She merely dropped a small blue materia orb into the drink Tifa had poured. The materia dissolved into the liquid as if it was never there.

"Oh!!" Tifa was startled as she turned around. The young woman smiled brightly. "Can I help you." She nodded and pointed to a bottle of vodka above.

"One shot." She said with a gentle smile. Tifa shrugged and got her a shot glass then poured her one. "Hey." She tapped Tifa's drink with her fingernail. "Cheers" Tifa nodded and picked up her glass they both raised it. With a *clink* they both downed their drink. "Thank you Tifa, this will be a wonderful night!" The girl got up and smiled as she left her payment and walked out.

"How did she know my name?" Tifa asked herself but before she could ponder on it she felt...odd, and stronger and all in all just powerful! "Whoa, ok I know I'm not drunk!!" Tifa said as she shot up to 3 meters tall (9'9) Her head NEARLY touching the ceiling. "Whoa..." She whispered repeated herself she felt a strange power inside her.
1111.title: That weird materia

112.content: Plenty of women to choose from in this fighter but who to go with?

114.content: Which Girl from the acclaimed series grows?
114.title: Super Mario Bros. Series

choices: Hold a person in her hand.
Hold the Entire Castle in Her Hand.
Hold the Entire Kingdom in her Hand!!
1141.content:
Princess Peach woke to an everyday thing.She rose from bed,looked out of the tower's window to see the Mushroom Kingdom spread out before her.She changed into her usual pink Dress,a matching pink parasol in hand,and she went down the stairs to visit the kitchen for a quick breakfast before the day.

Multiple servants greeted her on the way."Good Morning Princess!!"They said together,bowing their mushroom heads."Good morning everyone!"Peach would reply,giving a dainty smile,and gave a small bow back.

Something strange caught her eye though.There was a new hallway.Peach knew the entire castle inside and out,and she had never noticed this hall before."Well...maybe it's a new addition."She came up with an explanation to herself,walking down the new hall without caution.

The hall seemed....gloomy.Much darker than the rest of the castle.Shadowy figures seemed to watch the princess,then dissapear if she looked their way.

Finally,at the end of the hallway,was a mushroom.Much like the mushrooms Peach had seen Mario use to grow about twice his size and stomp on enemies too large to be defeated normally.But,this shroom had a 'G' emblem on it,and the shroom seemed to emit a strange aura around it.

She took it in hand,and gave it a delicate sample nibble.Her face lit up.It was positively delicious!!Peach took another bite,then another,and another,until the mushroom had entirely been eaten.One thing Peach did not notice,that the hallway was shrinking.Or,was she getting bigger?

She grows big enough to....
1141.title: The Giant(ess) Peach

choices: Peach decides to go see Daisy
Her thoughts are interrupted as she grows even more
11411.content: With a bite Peach dropped the mushroom in shock as it vanished. She felt herself grow, then shrink then grow again much like how Mario shifted. "No wonder he likes these! That felt gooood!!" She giggled only then did she realize how big she was. "Oh dear! I could likely hold two of my servants in my hands! Therefore I must be..." Peach didn't continue, math wasn't her forte. Her dress, stockings and shoes had grown with her as well. "I'm a biiiiig girl now, Mario likely won't be able to carry me anymore." She sighed for a moment. "Oh well...speaking of Mario I haven't seen him in a while, then again...I wonder how Daisy is doing..."
11411.title: Hold a person in her hand.

1241.content:
Orihime was walking home from a recent battle with a Hollow; she didn't get the chance to fight it but Ichigo destroyed it in mere seconds. Orihime felt ashamed that she couldn't help him in any way. While in mid-thought, the Hollow somehow appeared in front of her but it was larger than normal! At first, Orihime was scared, but then she realized she could fight it without Ichigo. She then punched the Hollow without thinking or hesitation. Strangely enough, it dissipated then was absorbed by her. Orihime felt a surge of energy and felt strange but she couldn't tell what. She shrugged and skipped happily home after defeating the Hollow.

How fast will Orihime grow?
1241.title: Orihime's Big Chance

choices: Orihime decided to calm down and get help
Orihime started to panic (Rukia and Ichigo sensed this and went to check it out)
12412.content: As she went inside her house, Orihime still felt the energy inside her but she felt sleepy. Orihime then decided to lay down on her bed, her body sprawled out. Her bed was big enough to have Orihime like this, so she felt comfortable and was about to sleep. The spiritual pressure inside her flowed through her body and felt like it was building up and expanding. She looked down on her self and saw her boobs were larger than they were before. Orihime sighed and said aloud, "They just want to keep getting bigger!" Orihime then felt her hands on the edges of her bed, she couldn't believe this since the bed was indeed larger than her. She sat up and saw that her feet was starting hang off her bed as well. Orihime scratched her head in disbelief, "What's going on? My body is overwhelming with this energy." Her shirt started to tear and stretch with her oversized breasts, her skirt looking shorter on her by the second. She didn't know what to do.
12412.title: Rising Heroine

choices: Follow Toshiro,as he chases after Rangiku.
Follow Rangiku,as she continues her growing destruction.
12431.content:
Captain Toshiro Hitsugaya woke up to a beautiful morning.He donned his captain's attire,and his blade was ready at his side.Suddenly,there was a massive earthquake,and a shadow overcame the Soul Society."Good God.....what's going on today?"He muttered to himself,looking out the window,and gasped a little.

Looking up,Toshiro saw a foot.Except,this foot was large enough to crush even the largest building's in the Soul Society.Each toe was easily thrice as big as he was.Looking up,the foot belonged to a seducting leg,and looking up further,a thin,tight stomach.His gaze couldn't go farther,behemoth breasts,barely covered by a black bra blocked his view.

"Rangiku."He instantly came to a conclusion.Before he could do anything,he saw the already Giantess Rangiku double in size!!She shot up through the air,her growth destroying several buildings surrounding her.She now stood around 500ft. tall.

Rangiku began to walk,her footsteps creating great tremors,and her feet stomping anything in her path to dust."Look out Soul Society,here comes the ever-growing Rangiku!!"She said happily,as she grew another 100 feet in size.
12431.title: Rangiku's Rampage

124312.content:
Rangiku Matsumoto hummed a little tune to herself,smiling happily as she merrily stomped through the Soul Society,becoming bigger every minute.She had already grown to 1000 feet tall,standing higher than most of the towers in the Society.But,she was dissapointed as she looked on at the tallest tower,which stood hundreds of feet higher.

"Oh well.I'll be bigger than you in a couple minutes!!"She said,then skipped back to her rampage.The Soul Reapers below were forming a small army,about to attack the Giantess.Only a handful came out to fight,others were hiding,others were strategizing,and most were dead.

Rangiku looked down,and grinned at the group of ants by her feet."Come on,everybody!!Do you actually think you can hurt gigantic,sexy me?"She mused,her voice becoming louder.

In reply,most of the Shinigame rushed forward,stabbing their zanpakuto's into her toes.No luck.Somehow,the blades broke upon contact against the skin."See?"Rangiku sneered.Whatever gave her this power,Rangiku seemed invincible,unable to be hurt,and ever becoming bigger.The Soul Reapers ran,but a few stubborn ones stayed,ready to fight to the death.

Rangiku sighed,getting on her knee's,and flicking the ants away.Only one remained now.He was a novice,fresh out of the academy.And,he refused to leave,standing his ground.Even after he saw the giantess get even bigger,doubling in size.Now 2000ft. tall!!
124312.title: Follow Rangiku

13533.content: Maybe a giant Jennifer Lopez would be to your liking?
13533.title: J-Lo?

135331.content:
It seemed to be yet another endorsement offer for Jennifer Lopez. It came in the form of a package on her front stoop. When she brought it in and opened it up, she found what seemed to be a bottle of perfume with a note. The note went as follows:
"Ms. Lopez,
We at Swift Cosmetics are seeking a spokeswoman for our new, yet-unnamed perfume line. We think you are the ideal candidate because of your natural beauty and marketability. Please try out the sample that is provided and let us know what you think."
To her, it certainly was a tempting offer. Figuring that it couldn't hurt to try it, she grabbed the bottle and sprayed some on lightly. She liked the way it smelled, but it started to make her dizzy. Before she knew it, she had wandered outside. Everything had gone blurry before she fainted.
She didn't know how long it was before she woke up, but that was soon the least of her thoughts. When she gathered her bearings, she noticed that everything seemed to looked smaller, including the crowd that gathered around. Judging from her surroundings, she estimated her height to be...
135331.title: Like a Latina Weed

1353311.content:
As she slowly stood up, she got a good look at the neighborhood. She was rather amused that the surrounding houses looked more like doll's houses, and that the occupants looked like dolls. She put her hands on her hips and smirked, remembering what she liked to do with dolls.
One particular one catches her eye. He looked at her with a look of uncontrollable lust on his face. He had his hand in his pants, clearly rubbing one off, not bothering to hide the stain caused by what he already shot. She hardly wasted any time in grabbing him and bringing him to her face.
"Do you like what you see?" Jennifer asked him, getting a nod in reply. "Do you think that I'm a sexy goddess?" Again, only a nod. "Do you like being my little doll?" Another nod. "Well, then I'll treat you like one."
She grabbed the arm that was stroking himself and pulled it off, laughing as he started screaming in agony. "I'm just getting warmed up, Ken," she said as she pulled off a leg, then the other arm, then the remaining leg. Seeing that he was about to pass out from the pain, she quickly pulled off his head so he could feel it, letting the torso fall to the ground.
She looked down at the petrified crowd, many of them shocked from her actions, but too scared to care. She laughed maniacally at the sight before her, wondering her next move.
1353311.title: A Doll's Neighborhood

13533111.content:
"Well, I know how to get a rise out of all of you," Jennifer says with a mischevious smirk. To get that rise, she lifts her foot and slams it on a nearby house, not knowing or caring if anyone was inside.
That seems to do the trick, as everyone scatters in all directions. She decides to follow the biggest crowd. Even though they were running down the middle of the street, she pursues them by literally walking through the houses. Even though she caught up with them quickly, she got ahead of them with an idea in mind.
When she was at what she thought was a suitable distance, she sees a full bus on the street. Even though it was longer than she was tall, she crouches down and lifts it off the ground, lifting it over her head. On seeing this, the crowd tries to stop and turn around. However, this would only lead to mass confusion and pandemonium, unknowingly playing right into her plan. Not wasting the moment, she throws the bus into the crowd, crushing many before exploding, causing a massive fireball that incinerates much of the crowd and several houses.
Jennifer just stood there with her hands on her hips, reveling in the destruction that she wrought.
13533111.title: Demolition Woman

135331112.content:
Figuring that this neighborhood grasped who is in charge, Jennifer looks around for her next destination. From her vantage point, she sees the skyline of the city and gets an idea.
Seeing that the city is more or less a straight shot for her, she starts walking that way. She knows that there is going to be damage, but she doesn't care. She just steps through and on everything that gets in her way. She crushes people, flattens cars, splinters houses, and rips through power lines with her shapely legs. None of this seems to matter to her as long as she gets a chance to prove a point.
Only once, near the edge of the suburbs, does she look back. She sees the damage that she created and smiles.
"I have never been one of you," she says. "I've always been a goddess. Now I just have the ability to show it."
135331112.title: Downtown Stroll

1353311122.content:
She may have only looked back the one time, but that was all that was needed. In the time that she looked, the police manage to get into position. It was only when she hears the sound of choppers that she finally looks forward again.
"Jennifer Lopez, this is the police," comes over the loudspeaker.
"You don't say," she says sarcastically, putting her hands on her hips in a huff.
"Surrender, or we will take you by force."
"And what would you use to detain me?" she asks.
"Never mind that. Surrender now!"
"Make me," she says.
With that, she steps forward and steps on a police car, flattening it and anyone inside. The cops then instinctively open fire as the choppers move closer. When they get close enough, she raises her hands and simply swats them out of the sky, sending the fireballs they created on some of the police below.
"You really think you can stop a goddess?" Jennifer asks. "You little tykes are nothing to me."
1353311122.title: The Fuzz

135332.content: Maybe we can do something with these four?
135332.title: More

14.content:
OK...So choose a slot, create a girl and make her grow!

14.title: Create Your Own!

141.content:
Here are the girls:

Hannah, a 36 year old mother of a son and four daughters. Her husband is dead, but he left her enough money to live in relative comfort with her family. She doesn't have to work so she goes to the gym often allowing her to be in excellent shape. She has blond hair and green eyes with D cup breasts and she also has a nice tan. She is a caring women, who if given a lot of power, would not use it for her own ends, she puts her family before everything and would never purposely hurt anyone.

Ashley, a 10 year old girl, who has always had growth fantasies. She loves the idea of growing. If she ever grew, it is unknown how she would use her power, she would probably mostly use it for her own satisfaction, but may show herself to be a caring and gentle person. She has brown hair and big brown eyes with a prepubesent body.

Kelly, a 20 year old supermodel. The stereotypical type of giantess girl. Big breasts, tight body, blonde hair, blue eyes, and a craze for power.
141.title: Create Your Own #1

choices: You slowly make yourself grow everyday.
1412.content:
"Alright honey, make a wish and blow on them" said your mother, smiling.

Just then, you though of something you wished for as long as you could remember, then gathered your breath and blew the candles away. It was not easy being a small 10 years old, but now that you're 11 years old, maybe things will get for the better.

You blushed as everyone was clapping their hands, having blew all the candles first try.

"So, little sister" said Amber, your 6'2" tall 19 years old playful sister "What did you wish for?"
"S-e-c-r-e-t" you slowly respond with a smile.
"Tss, whatever, it's not like we wanted to know anyway" add Jess, your 16 years old bitch sister. Looking down at you from her even taller than Amber 6'6" huge body.
"Jess, be nice with your sister" said your mother.
"It's ok mom" you replied.

Everyone in your family was tall compared to you, since you only stood up at a mere 4'8" tall. But that was all about to change from now on. Sometimes, birthday wishes do come true.

In the evening, after the "party" was over and everyone was doing something else, you wanted to see if your wish had come true.
1412.title: Ashley

choices: Grow yourself in front of one of your sister.
14123.title: Mess with your family.

choices: A radioactive truck crashes, and the goo gets onto her.
She makes it to the school just fine.
The Monster Alert in the city goes off.
142.content:
Carly is an 17 year old Chinese girl with long black hair that goes down to her shoulder, pale skin, green eyes. Her body is very nice looking and she has a size D breast cup. She was getting ready for her final year at high school by putting on her school uniform, which conist of a blue skirt, a white shirt with the school logo on it, black socks, and brown shoes.

She was walking out of the house and heading towards the school, hoping today there isn't any giant monster attack. She was nomadic for most of her life as her panrents moved from city to city because of the monster attacks that tend to happen alot in her city.

She was walking down the city, then?
142.title: Carly, the Giantess.

143.content:
Monica, the underdog from New York
Having fought her way out of her poormans-home from in Bronx, New York - Monica at 27 is level-headed and serious-minded. She values hard work and order, and is a lawful citizen with a disdain for laziness and crime. Growing to gigantic proportions could ruin her self-estemm as it would break her life apart as she knew it, or she could grasp the power and try to make the world a better place. It would depend on the situation and peoples reception of her changes.
Monica is buxom but not tall enough to supplement her curvaceous physique. While certainly pretty she is not truly beautiful. She is dark-skinned, as befit her african-american parentage, though has a very plain face. Her hair is long and wavy, though she tends to keep it in a ponytail, to look more orderly.

Jillian, the teenager coming-of-age
A happy-go-lucky 14 year old. Though generally kind and warm-hearted, she is just entering the hardships of her teens, and is prone to fits of uncalled anger, courtesy of the hormones raging in her body. What she likes the most is a good balance of quiet-time for herself, and some good memories with her friends from school, though she is still trying to find her own place in life. Gigantism would be an unstable situation for her to find herself in, though she has a gentle heart and will hopefully follow it as much as possible.
Extraordinarily tall for a 14 year old girl, she is almost 5 feet 6 inches, standing taller than any girl and most boys at her age. At the same time she has a lanky and thin build, with little curves to speak of. Nonetheless her body is blooming, yet she is also still gaining more height as she ages. Green eyes and long white-blond curls, with a innocent face that seems both childish and adult, though slightly more the former than the latter

Clementine, or simply known by her nickname "Cleo"
A comely 23-year-old, with an overactive imagination. She has a tendency to play around like an overgrown child, as well as taking her selv-created fantasy-scenarios a bit too seriously. Growing would most likely result in her letting go of reality for a while. Whether that will be for the better or the worse, she will explore the possibilities of her newfound size with more curiosity than caution. She is by no means evil, merely playful.
She has a fair hourglass-figured body with long legs, and a decent height of 5.4 feet to begin with. Her hair has a light-brown hue, grey-blue eyes and her face has a small, pointy nose and full lips.

So which one will it be?
143.title: A few more choices

choices: You can´t. It´s a one way deal. You´re growing from now on!
Its really up to you! Go nuts!
14333.content:
Cleo was sitting by herself, daydreaming. The sort of day where she´d sit in her room staring in the blank space for hours, perhaps dance a little, act a little, perhaps masturbate a little. Other days she´d read, watch movies or ponder on the world and what is was about while lying on her terrace staring at the blue sky and sun. Her dreams and thoughts would often contemplate on herself and who she was. What was she doing in the world. And more importantly, why was she not doing more.

The world was so full of places to be, and cultures to explore. But as much as she craved for adventure the more saddening it was to know that she´d never go there.
Having just come out of college, with a fine diploma to go, she had been so sure that the world was hers for the taking. Instead she had gotten a deadbeat job as a waitress in a small diner where the tables was always greasy. With no money to be earned, the only adventuring to do was what she could do in her head or extract from fiction.
And the worst part? She felt so powerless. Like she had a problem, where she could never discover the solution. As if the only way to realize her fantasies. ALL of them. Was for some divine gift to be bestowed on her. But alas that would never happen in the real world. The real world was boring

Oh, bother! She thought to herself If only something could get me out of this damn rut! Something extraordinary! A real gamechanger!

Oh but there is answeared a unseen echo. Cleo sprang from her seat and scouted the room for intruders but found none!
"Who said that" she asked to the emptiness
I did said the voice. It belonged to a woman, and had a sort of harmonic music to it. It filled the room with a resonance that reflected on every wall and surface. Like a bell that made a thousand sounds rather than a single, as to mimic speech
"And who might "you" be then?" asked Cleo
Well, im you. Sort of
"Well you cant be me, can you now. Im here and you´re not where i am, so you can´t be me. Otherwise i´d be talking to myself, and that would just be silly". Though right in her way, Cleo knew that it was only half-true, as talking to herself was something she had done scores of times. Never out loud, though. Which was why this strange scenario stood out.
Well, im not entirely you. And yet i am. Im sorta the inside-you you, if that makes more sense. It didn´t. In fact it made less sense. Cleo thought she was being pranked.
You´re not being pranked that took Cleo aback.
"Did you just read my mind?" Asked Cleo in confusion.
No no. I heard it. I live in here after all
"So you´re just something im imagining"
No, not that either i'm really here. Im you, just without the body. I know everything though
"Oh really" Cleo found that this could be interesting. "Like what? Tell me! I´d love to know more stuff, and seems like you´re quite the person to ask!"
Oh please, don´t get snarky with me. The voice snapped in its music-like voice. Look, I´ve got a solution to your problem. Or our problem, however you want to interpret it.
"Solution? What do you mean by solution. How´s a voice gonna help me move on" Although Cleo had her doubts the voice seemed like a interesting development to her problem, and she´d welcome any help it had. Especially if it truly WAS all-knowing, as it boasted
How? Well, i know stuff for a starter
"Oh yeah. What kind of stuff?"
I know you want some power. I know you like to dream a lot. And i know how you can get the kind of power that you happen to dream about A sudden shiver froze Cleo in her place. She stood silent for a moment, thinking if there was truth to what the voice said. Was the voice even real, or was she still daydreaming?
You´re not daydreaming. And im not lying either This time the voice not only read her mind, but predicted her next thought as well. If this was legit, where was the loss in going along?
"That power, huh? And how would i get that power then". Excitement surged through Cleo by this point. As if she was unwrapping christmas-presents as a child.
It´s already in you. The answear caused both confusion and disappointment. Cleo did not know how to act, so she asked
"Uuhh... What do you mean?"
It´s already in you, Clementine. You just found your inner voice. Me being here is a proof of that. Now you gotta find your inner power. The power within you. Grasp it, and you dreams will come true. Like a child in a playground, all you have to do is start the game you want to play. Its that simple

Five minutes later Cleo found herself standing in front of the mirror that hung on her apartments door. It rose as tall as her, and she had a full view of herself. Its was time to test the legitimacy of whatever had contacted her. There could be two outcomes to this. Either her life was about to get a whole lot bigger, given that the voice told the truth. Or she´d stand alone and unaltered, which of course would prove that the voice had been another too realistic daydream all along.
Im not a daydream! exclaimed the voice
"Then how do i do this" asked Cleo. In spite of making everything sound simple, the voice was asking her of a more complex task than she could solve herself.
You just do it. Its that simple. Its all im your imagination already. All you have to do is make it real. Unsure of what "it" really was, Cleo nonetheless gave it a shot.
She took a heavy breath, sucked in her belly, took a firm stance and gave her reflection a sharp look. She put her mind to the situation. Can´t hurt to try she thought to herself.
Exactly replied the voice.
And with that Clementine did it. With every strain her mind could muster she told her body to do the exact thing that she and the voice wanted it to. She described the action she wanted to occur aloud with a single word: "Grow!"

And she did. A jolt ran throughout her entire being, and in a split second, her entire figure suddenly elongated by half a feet, setting her well at 6, feet tall. Her frame left the space of the mirror within the second, and her clothes tigthened around her body. Nothing was by extraordinarily much, but it was nonetheless completely real.
"Holy fucking shit!" Cleo yelled in joy. "It really worked!". There was still a hint of doubt even when she stood with results
Told ya it would. You just had to do it. The voice was impossible not to hear. Though it was possible to ignore it. All Cleo could think of was the power she had just gotten, and whether she could excersize it again.
Once again, she put her mind to the idea of getting bigger, and yet again her voice swole in growth, this time even more violently than the former one. "Wohohohoa, here we go" she said in ecstacy, while the growth lifted her another 2 feet in the air, and only seemed to stop abruptly when she knocked her head on her ceiling. Her body´s expansion ripped her clothes apart. The sleeves on her shirt sprang, unable to contain her swelling arms, and her shirt ripped on from the midriff and up. What was left of it remained overstretched and tight around her cleavage. The sewings in her pants could not contain her legs which grew with her, leaving her pants a hull of dangling cloth, with holes on evey side.
Towering over her apartment living/bedroom, Cleo happily studied her new and massive height. She thought of the untold potential that was hidden in this oddly sudden ability she had unlocked, and the happier it made her, the more longing she became for her next growth surge.
"This is amazing" she said to the voice. "I have to do it again. You have to tell me how to control this!"
Well the thing is... replied the voice
...
14333.title: By mysterious and unexplainable means

choices: She grows until she is 1 mile tall
She grows until she is... tall
144.content:
Daenerys sat on her throne in Mareen. She sighed thinking about how she could keep control of Mareen let alone conquer Westeros. She was the so called mother of dragons but she was losing control of them.

"My queen a crimson comet is coming right towards us" Grey worm said in a panic

Daenerys rushed outside and gazed at the crimson comet. It was getting closer and closer. The land around turned a shade of crimson. Her people were screaming at her to do something. But she did not know what to do.

Suddenly, she heard the roar of dragons. Her 3 dragons (Drago and the 2 she imprisoned flew right in front of her. The imprisoned dragons broke free after sensing their mother was in danger. Daenerys was crying with tears of guilt about how the dragons were willing to risk their life for her even though she imprisoned them.

The dragons breathed a fiery stream at the comet. But it was completely ineffective. Daenerys stood alongside her dragons. The comet was going to impact.

No one had died, no noise was heard. The comet was being absorbed into Daenerys. Daenerys could feel power coursing through her veins. She began to grow.
144.title: Daenerys Targaryen (Game of Thrones)

1441.content:
Everyone had their mouths agape. They felt a mixture of relief and awe as they realized they were alive and that their queen had saved them. The people thought they were seeing things. Their queen was growing.

Her clothes could not resist the strain her powerful body put on them so they ripped, her glorious nude form now exposed to the world. She rose higher and higher. Her feet expanded towards her people. The people were frozen in fear and awe, some willingly stayed to be a sacrificed to the Goddess before them. Their bodies were crushed to paste before the force of her divine feet. Finally she stopped growing. She was 1 mile tall.

"The dragon God has given me this power. I am no longer your queen, I am your Goddess. Now become mine and join me in my conquest to rule this world." Daenerys boomed

She marveled in amazement at her power. To think she used to be one of these mites that scurried at her feet. They were not even the size of one of her toes. Just the strength of her voice caused the people to cover their ears and her dragon was smaller than her breast. There was a dragon perched on each breast. Her skin had turned a pure divine white. Her third dragon was perched on her head on her radiant golden locks.

The people stared in awe at their Goddess. The dragons looked like mere bugs next to her. Everyone bowed before Goddess Daenerys, they were all hers.

"Good but this is no different to how you treated me when I was your queen. But now I am divine. I am a Goddess, your Goddess so WORSHIP ME.

Her people rushed to feet some rushed to her toes. They began to lick. They were greeted with the taste of foot oil and sweat it was not good but it could have been a lot worse.

"My skin is divine but you worms are not yet worthy of tasting the true taste of my feet so I have replaced it with how my feet tasted when I was queen. In any case you have done well, now I will free all the slaves so they can serve their Goddess."

Goddess Daenerys could see a slave city in the distance. It was 20 miles away. A distance she could cover with one step. She raised her divine foot. Its shadow enveloped all her people. She moved it until it loomed over the other city and slammed.

The force she unleashed on the city was cataclysmic, houses and towns were reduced to rubble. Before anyone could admire her divine power. She raised her divine foot and slammed it right next to her other one. There were no survivors. Her dragons barely stayed perched to her. Her people were petrified once again in a state of shock and fear at the power of Goddess Daenerys.

"Hmm it seems I have destroyed the city, oh well it is a great honor to die underneath a Goddess. But I do not want everyone to die. Still it was not a total waste. Everyone on this continent is now aware of my divine might. Still to remove any doubt of my power, I will give them a slight glimpse of my true power." Goddess Daenerys said

Goddess Daenerys began to grow. Luckily she was facing away from her people so her expanding feet bulldozed through slave cities instead. In 10 seconds she had doubled in size but she did not stop there. She carried on for a full minute until she was 100 miles tall.
1441.title: D

15.title: Multiple Girls

154.content:
http://spriters-resource.com/ds/beachder...

(From Left To Right)

Hazuna,Reni,Mii,Demis,and Nindaline.
154.title: Bikini Babes Turned Giantess

1542.content: They are gentle,caring souls or evil and rampaging?
1542.title: They're All Colossal!!

choices: Time for a quick tanning break! But... are they growing again?
15422.content:
(Here's a fixed link to that picture from 2 chapters before, if that's your thing: https://www.spriters-resource.com/fullvi...)

Intense rumbling shook Naha City again and again. It was a slow, continual set of tremors, shaking the foundations of several buildings. Of course, the citizens and tourists expected the occasional earthquake, but there was another cause for alarm here. A long stretch of restaurants, bars, and shopping areas rested in a dark shadow, rising and descending ominously. Up, and down. Up, and down...

Hazuna snored softly as she regained consciousness. She reached an arm up to rub her eyes clean of sleep - and felt it weighed down. Buildings trembled again.

Her red hair swooped around as her head flopped to the right. Though she couldn't make out the resort she and her friends had deposited their luggage in, it was easy to see the sand covering her body. There was even an impressive sandcastle built on her stomach. Sniggering erupted from her left; when Hazuna turned her head to spot it, she found herself staring at a pair of ankles. Following them upwards led to a blue swimsuit (borrowed from a friend), a cheery smile, and bright pink pigtails.

"Heeey, Mii." The sand-bound girl yawned out, with a flat smile. "Guess I kinda dozed off there, huh?"

The echoing, tired voice shot through the sky.

Mii giggled again, looming above while patting down another handful of sand onto Hazuna. "You can sleep though anything!"

The redhead would've shrugged if she didn't have that enormous pile of fine grains on her. "The sun always makes me lethargic..."

With a long stretch, Hazuna tore herself away from her grounded position. Instantly, the sand slid off the side of her stomach - and something crashed below. The sandcastle... Wait, no. Her fingers brushed against the side of a shattered, rectangular structure, hidden in the sand. A skyscraper?

She looked around. Everything was far too low to the ground. The beach barely stretched for a few feet. Everything looked tiny, even the ships in the water... Except for her four friends, snickering around.

"What? What did you guys do?" She started panicking, sweatdrops falling down to Naha City. "We're enormous!"

Remi smiled, looking at the ground below. "Absolutely gigantic! And you were in just the PERFECT state to bury in sand - with a little city block underneath!" She laughed, brushing her blueish hair back. "You really -can- sleep through anything."

Demis lifted a hand behind her own, shorter, purple hair, looking uncertain. "I've hear my homeland... I mean, the US - they have bases here. They may have conducted some type of experiment, that could, possibly, have led to this."

Suddenly, strong, slender arms wrapped behind her. Nindaline was hugging Demis tightly. "Then a huge thank-you from China! I'm so glad we could all gather here!"

The newly-awoken girl was still disoriented by the sudden change. The strong scent of the ocean, the sounds of fleeing people, everything at a miniaturized scale below... It dizzied her. "You know, maybe we should ask that army for some help."

Remi chimed in: "Or destroy their base. And declare world dominance. We should weigh every option!"

Mii, the shortest - but the eldest - crossed her arms. "Nuh-uh! Nindy and Demis came all the way to Japan! We deserve a vacation, we're gonna have super-giant bundles of fun, and these stupid little people aren't going to get in the way!" She crossed her arms. With that voice, nobody could argue. "Nindaline! Choose our first game!"

She looked a bit off-guard, her green locks swaying against the pink swimsuit. "Uhm, how about a simple warm-up game? You have any of those?"

"Warm-up... Could I suggest Oshikura Manju?" Demis suggested. "I've wanted to try that for some time."

"Oshikura Manju?" The Chinese girl shot a puzzled gaze back. "What kind of Japanese magicks is that?"

Reni lifted a finger to the clouds, happy to take a chance to explain. "All participants enter a circle, and press their backs together."

As she narrated, Mii eagerly began carving the streets. She laughed at how easily the concrete base gave way to her active, twitching fingers. People dove and hid from the goliath-sized wall of flesh that was bulldozing the neighborhood. It crossed through a few homes, slicing the walls neatly. By the end, no less than 3 blocks were within Mii's constructed play area.

"When one player gives the signal, everyone pushes back against each other as hard as possible, still facing the ring's outside. The goal - beyond warming up through shared body heat - is to push all other players out." With the seriousness of an Olympic athlete, she walked into the play area, legs spread apart. A few loose, blue strands of her hair rained down to the ground as she brushed it back.

Demis inched forward next. The Asian-American hesitated, dangling a sandal above the clean beach community below - before entering toes-first, as if it were a cold pool. The citizens ran for emergency exits, only to find a moat blocking the way. Mii had been eagerly scooping up salty ocean water in her hands (paying no mind to swimmers that fell in her palms) and dumping it into the trench she dug. There was no way out for anyone trapped amid the city blocks.

Both this pink-haired girl and Hazuna entered next. The latter scratched her arm, grinning to the others. "It's been a while since I've played this. Hope my karate classes pay off!" Their backsides squeezed against each other snugly as they got in the ring, all eight of the swimsuit-clad buttocks hanging ominously in the skies above. Only one girl was missing.

"Nindaline? Something wrong?" The redhead shouted to the pink-clad groupie. She was crouching down, one arm to the ground, the other held near her chest. Her slender fingers scooped a couple of fleeing citizens and cars, adding to the crowd she'd already collected - which rested in her other palm. She carried them into the ring with her. "I thought I'd invite some of these tiny people to join!"

"Huh, good thinking," Reni said with a sly look. "The game works better when there's more players... No matter how little chance they stand of winning." She placed a hand to her lips, cooing at the mass. "Ready to warm up?"

"I'm sorry..." Demis' immense - yet slender - shoulders shrugged to them.

All five girls were now ready. Their backsides pressed softly against each other, shivering in anticipation. The populace below shuddered in fear, looking for places to hide. Nindaline carelessly dumped the handheld crowd on her own backside - slight moisture on the swimsuit keeping them clinging on. A deadly drop below. The crushing strength of giant cheeks in every cardinal direction. They looked to the skies above for a miracle - and found a rainbow of hair colours. Their giant tormentors weren't even looking down at their victims. Just a game.

Mii's shriek shook the neighborhood - "Ready... GOooooowoahwoahwooooah!" The joint strength of the larger girls pushed her out nearly instantly. Citizens outside the ring, still able to evacuate, couldn't calculate the distance she'd fly and underestimated just how enormous her body was. Many of them met their final resting place under her screaming face. More still fell under her chest, buried instantly in bulbous graves. Only a few writhing, injured bodies survived under her once-short limbs.

"Oshikura Manju, osarete nakuna!" The others chanted happily, as was customary for the game - it became an ominous, all-powerful roar.

Back in the circle, utter chaos abounded everywhere. The girls pushed harder and harder against each other, chanting in excitement. The uneven movements made their sandals crash again and again around the ring - people below struggled to maneuver around and out of buildings before an errant stomp destroyed them. But the ones who had it the worst were those caught between the supple bikini bottoms.

They had no way of predicting any movement; while waiting for Demis' rear end to squeeze them in, Reni's would take them off-guard. The pain from the crushing strength could only by rivaled by humiliation from the fact it came from such cute girls wearing nearly nothing.

Demis was the next to fall out; she managed to keep her balance, gracefully skipping into a mall before stopping. Nindaline pushed harder, her legs making quick hopping motions that shook the ground. Breathing space became more and more limited. The Chinese girl put nearly all her energy in one push - leaving her weakened before she could react to their counter-attack. A block fell under the shadow of her bosom as she fell; only some lucky people near the cleavage area survived. The impact was so harsh, the entire city trembled, and some people bounced right into the folds of her bikini top.

"Aiyaa..." She groaned, looking down annoyed. "Screw seven generations of your ancestors."

It was down to two girls: Hazuna and Reni. Their hair colors clashed, painting a striking image in the skies; their butts clashed, too, painting striking images in the citizens' minds. The ones struck most of all, though, were those still between the bikinis; the heavenly white struggling to hold Hazuna's backside, or the tight folds around Reni's taut rear. It felt like thousands of tons were smashing them left and right. People below weren't any luckier; as both pushed with equal tenacity and energy, they wobbled all over the moat-blocked part of Naha City. Their sandals flattened every standing structure twice over while they rotated around; if one were to take all the shattered people, buildings, and dreams from underneath the soles, they could populate a small community.

Finally, Reni crashed to the ground, joining the three others. Hazuna brushed her swimsuit clean of debris and bodies, surprised at how pleasing the sensation was against her fingers.

"That was pretty fun! Good job, everyone. So, what's next?"
15422.title: Attack of the Gigantic Bikini Girls!

choices: No use sitting around - time for another fun-filled game!
They have some growing pains - ask the microbes to massage them!
This isn't big enough - how can they trigger another growth spurt?
154223.content:
Reni groaned in dissatisfaction, crushing a pair of houses as she went on her elbows. Her hands a few bits of debris and people off the ramp of her nose. They landed in her awaiting bosom, feeling uncomfortably cool. "Well, this bustling around is certainly fun, but I think a tanning break is in order. We should give ourselves a chance to soak in the sun." Annoyed by some squirming in her cleavage, she slammed her breasts together, flattening the survivors. "...And give this city a chance to soak in our bodies."

Still splat in the center of a residential district, stomach to the ground, Mii looked back over her shoulder at her friend. Even from the crouching position, stood taller than most of the structures around. "That's convenient! Nindy and I won't even have to move." She swept her arms and feet up and down several times over, making a snow angel out of flattened ruins. "But we've gotta play something really good when we're done. We won't be in Okinawa forever."

"And we can't tell how long these effects will remain..." Demis shuddered. She looked around for a relatively clear spot, ending up resting her backside in the ring her and her friends had just fought in. It unknowingly squeezed the last traces of life under its plush expanse. She stretched her legs out, staring up at the sky - humming uneasily as she felt the soles of her cork sandals slice the corner of a store.

"Ngg, I just woke up, though... And I just cleaned this junk off!" Still wiping across her chest with the front of her arm, the mighty Hazuna, stretched her cramped legs and backside, striking a fearful image against the glowing sun.

A little laugh erupted not that far - relatively - beside her. Nindaline's hand gripped her ankle - even at the same height as her friend, the buxom girl was amazed at the size of the hand against the people below. "Come on! What was it you say again in Japan? 'The nail that sticks out gets pounded down', right?" As if to demonstrate that, she tugged her friend's leg, bringing the girl crashing to the ground. Screams erupted from every direction as the soil shook. Hazuna's lithe frame caused an eruption across Naha City, destroying a few more buildings on their last legs. Surprisingly, the ground seemed soft, so easily did it retreat upon being touched by the bikini goddess' flesh.

"Aahaa, okay, okay! No use wiping these crushed things off again." The redhead snickered, the sound echoing across the land. "And I guess you gals deserve to relax after I beat you so badly." Her white-clad buttocks wiggled as it got comfortable.

Reni turned to her, the side of her black bikini crushing a traffic jam, her indigo hair sweeping across the streets. "I'm sure you'll win this tanning game, too. Nobody can conquer The Great Hazuna when it comes to slacking off."

Suddenly, she felt a hand move across her back. Her haughty expression gave way to wide-eyed surprise. The active fingers smeared a few bodies smeared against the curves and folds of skin. Looking behind her, the once-tiny, pink-haired girl was giggling like a madwoman. "Just puttin' on some sunscreen!"

Unable to respond, Reni simply shifted to her stomach; stretching herself until the streets had comfortably given way under the weight of her body. Mii sat down, then went back into lying position, her titanic cheeks lit up by the glow of the warm sun. The red-haired girl curled up around a building, her right arm caressing it into her side. The Asian-American Demis kept staring at the sun, rubbing her head of the sweat that crossed it. Nindaline, herself, was playing idle games with the people, chasing them with her titanic fingers, which stomped across the crumbling cement like miniature giants themselves.

As they cornered a man down an alley, she reached in. He screamed in terror. They approached, overwhelming him, blocking out the sun... And stopped. The soft skin brushed against the windows of the buildings to either side. Strange, they fit in perfectly into that crack a second ago. He shivered with morbid anticipation. She attempted to pull her hand back out, and simply crush him under her fist... But couldn't.

That's when the green-haired girl noticed: these digits were getting bigger. Too big for the alley. Wiggling them around, she loosened a few chunks of cement; then cleanly sliced through the great structures, burying the escapee in a grey tomb.

She felt a warm pressure in the depths of her stomach. The Chinese girl called out: "Hey! I think I'm growing again!"

The oldest of them squirmed against the sensation of fleeing people. "Ooohoo, I'm feeling it too! That bumpy sensation in my belly, like I'm bloated on snacks!"

Hazuna groped herself, curious. Indeed, it felt like something was pushing out. In small pulses, matching the rhythm of her heartbeat perfectly. First, a tickle, squirming around her navel. Then, a few thumps later, a warm caress, like a lover's embrace. It blended in with the sun's lingering heat, spreading across her. Her fingers and toes curled and uncurled multiple times in the continual, mouth-watering gains.

"W-woah..." She tried lifting herself up to get a better look around at the diminishing Naha City; but a few more pulses of growth lured her back to the ground. The titanic girl had to content herself with comparing her arms and hands with the surrounding structures, very few of which still existed. Every little spurt, they stretched out further, hitting new goalposts of still-standing landmarks. "Did it feel like this last time?"

The only girl she could see from her position was Reni, resting across a residential district, and kicking her legs out in comfort "Mmmh... No, this is far better." Her eyes shot coyly towards the girl, as one of her stretches tore through a fleeing crowd. "That buzzing inside was there, yeah. But the overall sensation... Knowing that a thousand eyes are staring at you... Each of them gazing up in fear, seeing your body taking them over effortlessly..." She brushed an arm lazily through a street, gathering four houses inside of it - before her fingers compressed them. Her backside stretched over another set, flattening them. "And knowing, knowing that they can't do anything about it! Demis, I'd LOVE to see your military try and challenge us now."

The purple-hair girl shook, almost deathly still. She took deep breaths with each pulse, her face getting redder with every one. "Thousands... Thousands of people... N-national news... American military... I - I can't show my face..."

Nindaline's hand brushed across her shoulders calmly, while the other pressed on her stomach, feeling the beating pulse and trembling skin grow calmer against her strength. "Hey, don't worry. We're here for you." She felt the shoulder outgrow her hand, and her smile suddenly gained a slightly jealous tone.

"Hey, uh - we're not growing at the same rate, are we?" Hazuna asked, flopping over to Mii. The delightful caresses now became tenser - stronger, as if her stomach had to stretch out in order to accommodate the will of the unknown force making them grow. She bit a little with each tremble now, the rhythm maintained, but the individual spurts' power increasing exponentially.

The pink-haired girl rolled around, in a mix of discomfort and playfulness. The body, still more squat, was larger than any of the others'. Her breasts and backside flattened new parts of the surrounding landscape with every twist. To civilians, it sounded like a series of progressively louder earthquakes, as the range of her rolling-pin maneuver grew and grew. "Ahah, yeah. We figure it's something to do with your heart speed and sun exposure." She went back and forth quickly over one area three times, creating a rounded pair of canyons. "But when it ended last time, everyone was aboooout the same size. Well, relatively-speaking, y'know. So don't worry! If it's like that, you'll be taller than me like usual again soon!"

Now, with her body used to the stinging, the white-clad young woman didn't feel as much hurt by the growth spurts as dizzied. Every beat, every breath changed her perspective. It grew harder to see where her friends were, and how they were taking it - though judging by Reni's expression earlier, and her excited gasps now, Hazuna wouldn't be surprised if she'd just dropped her bikini onto the ground and started stroking herself. Which wasn't something she exactly needed to see; so she just drank in the changes as best she could, watching the East China Sea grow closer, and the ground grow farther from her expanding eyes.

The last pulse outdid the rest of them, nearly doubling her size. Hazuna was the first to reach it; she screamed in a mixture of ecstasy, pain, confusion, and excitement. Mii joined in, followed by Nindaline's low tone, Demis' shriek, and Reni - who screamed in quick pulses that sounded like a Saturday morning anime villain's laugh. This deafening choir knocked windows out for many feet across, and a lingering trace of the sound could be heard all the way from South Korea.

Most of them couldn't do much but lie panting for a minute afterwards. When Mii popped up, she felt the ground give way under her sandals, sinking in a bit. "Hee, I guess we can't vacation in Naha anymore - we've practically stomped it to paste!"

Demis was next, shaking up, nearly unable to bear the weight of her own body. "The cloud layer... It begins at our knees now. We've grown over ten times. We now stand about 4 miles high - or 6 kilometers in metric." Her careful, measured body language betrayed her fascinated tone.

Reni cooed, rubbing her cheeks in a wide smile. "Yesss, talk numeric to me."

"Uhm... The Sea of Japan would reach our chins at best. Our ankles reach the same height of the Tokyo Tower. My... My country's Statue of Liberty would look 1cm high."

"Yeah, like that... I love you..."

The rest of them were now standing, regarding the Okinawan island spread out below them. Five girls across the horizon.
154223.title: Tanning Growth Spurt!

info.brief_description: A GTS story about becoming as big as you possibly can
info.description:
The goal of this story is to choose a girl and to make her as big as you possibly can.

Rules:

1. No vore or scat!

2. No males growing...GTS only.

3. If possible, try to have one option in each chapter that allows an adder to make the desired girl even bigger in the next chapter.

Other than that, there are no rules. Just make girls grow...and grow...and GROW!

Update 6/21/13: Over 6200 views! Thanks to everyone viewing this story! Feel free to make your own additions!

Update 9/29/09: Over 30 chapters! Thanks to everyone who has added to the story and keep the chapters coming!
